Text: Could you upload commentaries from other seasons?
I agree with porren. If you have any other seasons, please don't hesitate to upload them.
I've made a torrent with the audio comments for the first season. It's under https://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7398395/The_Simpsons_-_Season_1_-_Audio_Commentary_-_DVDRip_-_AAC
